results.name: Denominator of n^(n-2)/n!.
comment: Denominators of coefficient in LambertW(x) power series, where LambertW(x) is the transcendental function satisfying LambertW(x)*exp( LambertW(x) )=x. - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 08 2002
Absolute value of denominator of the coefficient of 1/(n*x-1) in the partial fraction decomposition of 1/(x-1)*1/(2*x-1)*...*1/(n*x-1). [Joris Roos (jorisr(AT)gmx.de), Aug 02 2009]
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..450
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
